Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
11 Kusalattika, Lokiyaduka
Kusalattika, Lokiyaduka
21.
56Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naakusalo nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naakusalo nalokiyo ca naabyākato nalokiyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo nalokiyo ca naakusalo nalokiyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā pañca…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate pañca.
57Kusalaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nalokuttaro ca naakusalo nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
58Abyākataṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nalokuttaro ca naakusalo nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
59Hetuyā cha…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
